subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Patriots defeated William and Mary, 68-59, in the Colonial Athletic Conference tournament final to return to the N.C.A.A. tournament for the first time since the school’s 2006 Final Four appearance.
snippet: The Patriots defeated William and Mary, 68-59, in the Colonial Athletic Conference tournament final to return to the N.C.A.A. tournament for the first time since the school’s 2006 Final Four appearance.
